name: inbotiq
description: Full stack application with a Node/Express + MongoDB backend and a Next.js (App Router) + Tailwind CSS frontend.

scripts.bootstrap: npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install
scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,magenta "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,magenta "npm --prefix backend run start" "npm --prefix frontend run start"
